Machine learning with kernel methods
Spring 2022

by   Michael Arbel Julien Mairal and   Jean-Philippe Vert (Virtually)



MSc Mathematics, Vision, Machine Learning (MVA)
MSc Mathematics, Machine Learning, and the Humanities (MASH)
